title: SET_MP_GAMER_TAGS_VISIBLE_DISTANCE
content:
0xD61676B3// SetMpGamerTagsVisibleDistance
void SET_MP_GAMER_TAGS_VISIBLE_DISTANCE(float distance);Parameters:distance: The visible distance. Default is 100.0f.Sets the maximum distance at which all tags will be visible and which beyond will not be displayed. Distance is measured from the camera position.
